attributes.action: reduce the rate that Pensioners are deemed to earn on their savings for pension credit purposes from 10.4% to what they can actually get on the high street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners are deemed to earn 10.4% on their savings and therefore have their pension credit reduced for any savings over £6,000. This is not fair.  We suggest you change the figure to 0.4%
